description: When a hardshell is too much and a midlayer is not enough, the weather-resistant Kor Preshell™ Jacket is the layer you've been missing. Call it an ultralight softshell or a super breathable wind shirt—they just call it the do-it-all stretch layer for cool-weather trail runs, aerobic ski tours, big alpine rock routes, and...well, just about everything.
name: Mountain Hardwear Kor Preshell Jacket - Mens
